scripts.build: react-router build && echo 🏗️✅ Build passed! || (echo ❌ Build failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:types: yarn workspace server build:types && react-router typegen && tsc --noEmit && echo 🧠✅ Type check passed! || (echo ❌ Type check failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:prettier: prettier --check "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,css,json}" && echo 🧹✅ Prettier check passed! || (echo ❌ Prettier check failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:eslint: eslint "src/**/*.{ts,tsx}" && echo 🚨✅ ESLint passed! || (echo ❌ ESLint failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:stylelint: stylelint "src/**/*.css" && echo 🎨✅ Stylelint passed! || (echo ❌ Stylelint failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.format: yarn format:prettier && yarn format:eslint && yarn format:stylelint && echo 🧰✨ Codebase formatted
scripts.check:lint: yarn check:prettier && yarn check:eslint && yarn check:stylelint && echo 🔎✅ Lint suite passed!
scripts.check:knip: react-router typegen && knip && echo ✂️✅ Unused code check passed! || (echo ❌ Dead code found 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:dep: depcheck && echo 📦✅ Dependency check passed! || (echo ❌ Unused/missing deps 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:size: yarn build && size-limit && echo 📏✅ Size limits OK! || (echo ❌ Bundle size over budget 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:audit: yarn npm audit --severity=high && echo 🛡️✅ Security audit passed! || (echo ❌ Security audit failed 🔒💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:test: vitest run --coverage && echo 🧪✅ Tests passed! || (echo ❌ Tests failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.e2e: playwright test && echo 🚦✅ E2E passed! || (echo ❌ E2E failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.i18n:extract: i18next-cli extract && echo 🌍✅ i18n extraction passed! || (echo ❌ i18n extraction failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:i18n: i18next-cli extract --ci && echo 🌍✅ i18n check passed! || (echo ❌ i18n check failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.axe: playwright test --grep @a11y && echo ♿✅ A11y checks passed! || (echo ❌ A11y violations 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.lighthouse: lhci autorun && echo 🔦✅ Lighthouse passed! || (echo ❌ Lighthouse failed 💥 && exit 1)
scripts.check:all: yarn check:lint && yarn check:types && yarn check:knip && yarn check:dep && yarn check:size && yarn check:audit && yarn check:i18n && echo 🧰✨ All checks passed! || (echo '❌ Fix the issues above before committing 💡' && exit 1)
